mapper.sql: t_student.id, s_no, s_name, s_sex, s_birthday, s_enter_year
mapper.select: select s_no,s_name,s_sex,s_birthday,s_enter_year from t_student where s_no=#{sNo}
select c_no,c_name from t_student left join t_clazz on t_student.s_clazz_fk=t_clazz.id where s_no=#{sNo}
select g_score from t_student left join t_grade on t_grade.g_student_fk=t_student.id where s_no=#{sNo}
select d_no,d_name from t_student left join t_depart on t_student.s_depart_fk=t_depart.id where s_no=#{sNo}
